text: Pixie Retreat saved the day yesterday! I had to grab something quick before Brian's concert, so I picked up a bak'n cheezburger wrap and a kale mac-n-cheez wrap. Very delicious and nourishing. Also got a salted karamel kreem and a chocolate kreem. I like it better than dairy-based desserts and I like that it's not overly sweet. Looking forward to going back when I'm in less of a rush.
Sounds amazing. I'm so excited to try this place.
